// Import wordle with category and minimal formatting
$CATEGORY: Wordle Academic glossary

distribute according to a plan or set apart for a purpose{ALLOCATE}

having reached full natural growth or development{MATURE}

keep an eye on; keep under surveillance{MONITOR}

anything that contributes causally to a result{FACTOR}

of a government with central and regional authorities{FEDERAL}

a reserve of money set aside for some purpose{FUND}

to break or act against something, such as a law, agreement, principle{VIOLATE}

physical and mental health and happiness; state support for the poor{WELFARE}

an area in which something operates or has power or control{SCOPE}

similar things placed in order or one after another{SERIES}
